summary: After saving an infant of royal blood, knight Brancaleone forms a new army and sets out to return the baby to his father: a prince fighting in the Crusades.
cast: Vittorio Gassman|Adolfo Celi|Sandro Dori|Beba Loncar|Gigi Proietti|Gianrico Tedeschi|Lino Toffolo|Paolo Villaggio|Renzo Marignano|Augusto Mastrantoni|Gildo Di Marco|Shel Shapiro|Christian Aligny|Remo Bonarota|Franco Balducci|Pietro De Vico|Edda Ferronao|Alberto Plebani|Orazio Stracuzzi|Enrico Ribulsi|Arnaldo Fabrizio|Abou Djamel|Raymond Louzoum|Mokthar Dib|Ali Mansourane|Hassan Hassani|Maurice Pouillet|Hilmi Said|Stefania Sandrelli|Ceuru Abgui|Veriano Ginesi
keywords: men in tights|man tied up|burned at the stake|crusade|commedia all'italiana
title: Brancaleone alle Crociate
